messages.subject: WWII was patriotism and reality
messages.msgSnippet: ALL of the Holocaust survivor autobiographies are excellent.   Ask living relatives or anybody old enough. Take answers from the second source with a grain of
messages.messageBody:
ALL of the Holocaust survivor autobiographies are
excellent. Ask living relatives or anybody old
enough. Take answers from the second source with a
grain of salt.



--- Carrie0204@... wrote:

> Anyone have an recomendations for some good living
> books on WW2 that contains
> information on hitlers politics?
> ~~~Carrie

Make a great connection at Yahoo! Personals.

messages.subject: Re: patriotism and reality (Lynda)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/29/01 2:48:45 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... Yes a thousand times! Thank you Lynda for this email and to all the others who have voiced
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/29/01 2:48:45 AM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


>
> Which reminds me, any history buffs out there? Anyone else see the
> similarities between Hitler and Dumbya? The same retoric about "evil" in
> our midst???
>

Yes a thousand times! Thank you Lynda for this email and to all the others
who have voiced their suspicions or opinions that are contrary to the
"popular" belief. I was feeling like a very small minority before I started
to get back to reading my email groups and it would seem that a lot of people
are coming around to this exact train of thought. Those who don't learn from
history are destined to repeat it. I wish everyone would get their head out
of the mainstream media reports and into the history books....I know I could
use some history lessons myself. The beauty of homeschooling~I can make sure
my children learn it the correct way (lets not forget that history is written
by the winners) while learning it with them!!
IMHO only...our president is a very scary man (the word sociopath comes to
mind). Sure hope everyone in this country gets the heads up before its to
late.
Anyone have an recomendations for some good living books on WW2 that contains
information on hitlers politics?
~~~Carrie


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
